Hoboken.Mountain Pavilion:
The Mountain Pavilion was an inn located in Weehawken, New Jersey during the 19th century.


== Location ==
The Mountain Pavilion was situated atop The Palisades along Hackensack Road, offering panoramic views the Hudson River, Upper New York Bay, and Manhattan Island. Fitz-Greene Halleck received inspiration for his poem Fanny, satirizing New York society.
